Title: Silicon-based III-V quantum-dot lasers for silicon photonics
Abstract: © OSA 2016.Monolithically integrating III-V lasers on Si is the most promising solution for light sources on silicon. We demonstrated the first long lifetime for telecommunications-wavelength InAs/GaAs quantum-dot laser monolithically grown on silicon substrates.
